channel.title: Posts on Hi I am Yu-hsuan Li
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hi I am Yu-hsuan Li

item.title: BPM system
item.description: Our BPM system is based on the e-form requirements of the HRM system. We aim to expand more comprehensive functions to help organizations establish, execute, monitor, and optimize their business processes.

item.title: Seefood - image recognition system
item.description:
ðŸŒŸ 3rd place in 23rd International ICT Innovative Services Awards ðŸŒŸ

Seafood is an innovative app that helps foodies recognize cuisine from attractive photos and assists cooks in getting recipes and ingredient details. It also enables users to easily search for recipes by on hand ingredients, thereby helping them use up the food stored in fridges.

item.title: Drink King - drink order system
item.description: Drink King tries to help people who need drink order inspiration or suffer from group order chaos. Our users can easily search for drink shops around and see the drink lists offered today. They can also share their order with friends, who can add their customized orders themselves, making the group ordering process easier and more accurate.
